# Jeremiah Aworetan - Personal Website

> Frontend engineer building scalable web solutions for seamless user experiences. This website showcases my portfolio of projects, including web applications, landing pages, and development tools.

This website contains information about my work as a frontend engineer, including project showcases, contact information, and professional details. The site is built with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://www.jeremy0x.dev/): Personal introduction and overview
- [Projects](https://www.jeremy0x.dev/projects): Portfolio showcasing web development projects including crypto payment solutions, e-commerce platforms, and custom websites
- [Contact](https://www.jeremy0x.dev/contact): Contact form and information

## Projects

- [Surgechain](https://app.surgechain.io): DEX trading terminal that unifies news, pump-fun style memecoins, trending tokens, and perpetuals into a single interface with live on-chain execution, built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase/PostgreSQL.

- [Noblocks](https://noblocks.xyz): Open-source next-gen crypto payment solution with zero gas fees that removes P2P transaction complexity using a Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion frontend.

- [Kazlat LIMS](https://lims.kazlatpublicanalysts.com): Lab information management system for Kazlat Public Analysts that tracks samples from submission through analysis while generating invoices and client certificates using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Supabase/PostgreSQL, and Framer Motion.

- [Paycrest Dashboard](https://app.paycrest.io): Operations console for Paycrest's crypto-to-fiat rails that monitors settlements, liquidity, compliance states, and merchant analytics in real time.

- [Noblocks Blog](https://noblocks.xyz/blog): Sanity-powered blog for Noblocks with dynamic content rendering and SEO-focused Next.js integration.

- [AI Titans](https://t.me/AI_Titans_bot): Battle-focused tap-to-earn RPG Telegram Mini App built with React, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and the Telegram SDK for in-chat gameplay and rewards syncing.

- [Salvage Yard Store](https://www.salvageyardstore.com): Dual-sided e-commerce platform for electronic devices with inventory tracking, separate buyer/seller interfaces, and order management built on Next.js and TypeScript.

- [Shape Up Fitness](https://shapeupfitnessonline.com): Fitness platform showcasing gym services, facilities, schedules, and trainers using React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion.

- [Qari](https://qariworld.com): Premium ride-hailing waitlist site promoting clean vehicles, transparent fixed pricing, and WhatsApp-first driver support in Lagos.

- [Step-Up Academy](https://academy.stepupsummit.org): Multi-page academy experience that enrolls students into cohorts with Paystack payments and Resend-powered email automations using a Turborepo with Vite, Next.js API routes, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and PostgreSQL.

- [Mindlar](https://mindlar.com): Landing page for the Mindlar learning community that explains offerings and community values with a Vite, React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion stack.

- [Zap by Paycrest](https://zap-beta.jeremy0x.dev/): Hackathon-winning early crypto payment solution for Paycrest from the Based Africa hackathon, now deprecated in favor of Noblocks.

- [Sentinel Finance](https://sentfi.jeremy0x.dev): Proof-of-concept decentralized commerce platform combining e-commerce with blockchain payments using vanilla JavaScript and GSAP.

- [BahamaFoodie](http://hellobahamafoodie.com): Digital plant-based restaurant platform in The Bahamas with menu browsing, online ordering, and delivery tracking implemented in vanilla JavaScript and GSAP.

- [Lync](https://thelync.app): Product landing page for Lync with a modern, conversion-focused Next.js and Tailwind CSS design.

- [Valtrix](https://valtrix.jeremy0x.dev/): Website for a creative software agency featuring a clean brand presence and smooth animations built in vanilla JavaScript.

- [Sesshin](https://sesshin.jeremy0x.dev): Custom brand website with immersive GSAP animations and modern visual design.

- [$Dogatoshi](https://dogatoshi.jeremy0x.dev/): Meme coin community website that explains the $Dogatoshi project with an energetic Tailwind CSS UI.

- [Elder Wallet](https://elderwallet.jeremy0x.dev): Proof-of-concept Bitcoin wallet demo that surfaces Runes Network assets through a simple browser UI.

- [MentorMeInTech Waitlist](https://mentormeintech.jeremy0x.dev): Waitlist page connecting aspiring developers with mentors, focused on capturing signups and social proof.

- [foodieFetch](https://foodie-fetch.jeremy0x.dev): Recipe finder app that suggests meals from available ingredients with simple ingredient search and filtering.

- [LingoLookup](https://lingolookup.jeremy0x.dev): Comprehensive dictionary app that provides definitions, synonyms, antonyms, pronunciation, and examples with search history and favorites.

- [Mullti](https://mullti.jeremy0x.dev): Dual-sided e-commerce experience with product catalog, shopping cart, authentication, and order management built on Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

- [Sways](https://sways.jeremy0x.dev): Custom Dutch brand website that pairs minimalist visuals with smooth Next.js and Tailwind CSS animations.

## Optional

- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/jeremy0x): Source code repositories and contributions
- [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/jeremy0x): Professional network profile
- [Twitter/X](https://x.com/thejeremy0x): Social media presence
